title: Uluwatu Temple & Sunset Kecak (Half-day)
overview: A cultural half-day trip to Uluwatu Temple, ending with a dramatic sunset Kecak dance performance on the cliffs.

stops.description: Stop for a swim or a stroll at one of Bali’s most famous beaches.
Explore the ancient sea temple and walk along the clifftop paths.
Watch the iconic Kecak fire dance at sunset.

title: Bukit Peninsula & Uluwatu (Full-day)
overview: A full day exploring Bali’s Bukit Peninsula, including Uluwatu Temple, beaches, and a sunset Kecak show.

stops.description: Swim and relax at one of the Bukit’s most beautiful beaches.
Visit the famous surf spot and enjoy the sand and sea.
Lunch with a view of the Indian Ocean.
Tour the temple and dramatic cliffs.
Experience the sunset Kecak dance performance.
